"A.P.239/5/4":
"Oh, it's you.
You've come again, I am glad."
"Yu-chan and the grumpy boy there are continuously boring me."
"And this planet is boring me too. All I can see is just sand, sand and sand. A desolate planet."
"Lillipa, right? Hmm? What a planet. I wonder, did we control this place?"

"Enough, please answer [Apprentice].
A while ago, you've said that the [Profound Darkness] appeared \"again\"."
"It's not Apprentice, it's Aurora. Don't make that mistake again, Yu-chan."
"And it's exactly what I've said. You know that the [Profound Darkness], was born when the Photoners were alive?"
"Well, the [Profound Darkness] was created by us, the Photoners. It was crazy when it was born."

"It was unexpected when it was born.
But we've came together with countermeasures and we've managed to seal it."
"Such a seal is crazy. How did you seal it?"
"Hmm? It's... This is a story I've heard."
"The [Profound Darkness] sees all existences that uses Photons as its enemy. It will try to pursue and eliminate them."
"So they combined all of their photons into a single individual as bait and sealed the [Profound Darkness] alongside the individual."

"All into a single person, and sealed...
Did they really?"
"I wasn't too interested in the details, but I've heard it from an Admiral who I was acquainted with. So I have no doubt that it's true."
"You're sick."
"Sick? How so? It wasn't the best choice, but by sacrificing one person, we've saved many."
"Quite the honor student, hmm Yu-chan? Former [Apprentice]."

"Honor student... perhaps.
When I was [Apprentice], I wouldn't have thought of such a thing."
"But even now, I feel the resentment."
"It wasn't just the memories... but my heart, what they've altered."
"Well, we've sealed it. The Dark Falz ran amok afterwards. We couldn't claim victory about that."
"Absolutely."
"I'm tired of this area. Let's move to the next area."
